ns2:PrimaryTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: This MO represents one port in a HwUnit MO or ExternalNode MO where the Enclosure Control Bus (ECB) is connected.

ns2:primaryTypeAttribute.ns1:desc: The value component of the RDN.

The hub port that the external node or HW unit is connected to, used for addressing purposes. Must be set for HwUnit types CBU, DU, BFU, PSU, PDU and SUP. In case of SUP, only in configurations with two SUPs, and then only for the second SUP (with ID SUP-2). Not applicable for other HwUnit types. There are restrictions per RBS type on which hub ports that can be used for connection of specific HwUnit types. Valid values: • A0-A8, B0-B8: SHU is used as hub. • A-E: SCU/SUP is used as hub. • "": used when hub position is not applicable and EC-bus is used for communication. Value NA is also possible to use in this case. • AUX NA: Used when hub position is not applicable and AUX-bus is used for communication. The overlay mapping is A IN = A0, B IN = B0.

The cascading order when there are multiple HUBs or units connected in a cascade chain. The first unit in a cascade chain has value 1. If the EC-bus isn’t connected in cascade then the value shall be set to 0 (not applicable).
